content.text:
Business Card: PIANO [musical notes drawing] ACCORDION Jeff Epstein ALL OCCASIONS PHONE (212) ES 3-2262 | Photo Caption: RHAPSODY IN BLUE Bobby 
Aaron Brown Bar Mitzvah Wynn Hotel Phila. Sept 23 1961

text_sections.full_transcription:
Business Card: PIANO [musical notes drawing] ACCORDION Jeff Epstein ALL OCCASIONS PHONE (212) ES 3-2262 | Photo Caption: RHAPSODY IN BLUE Bobby 
Aaron Brown Bar Mitzvah Wynn Hotel Phila. Sept 23 1961
Document ID:
HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_000011
captions: Aaron Brown Bar Mitzvah Wynn Hotel Phila. Sept 23 1961
handwritten_portions: Aaron Brown Bar Mitzvah Wynn Hotel Phila. Sept 23 1961

metadata.subject: Childhood music career - business card and 1964 band photo

insights: Business card reveals Jeffrey Epstein's childhood entertainment business
Piano and accordion listed as primary instruments
September 23, 1964 photo - Epstein was 11 years old
'RHAPSODY IN BLUE' - Gershwin piece showing musical sophistication
Six-member youth band: Bobby, Howie, Dick Epstein, Jeff, Peter, David
Dick Epstein likely brother Mark using nickname
Children wearing matching striped shirts - organized ensemble
Professional microphones and music stands visible
Accordion prominently featured matching business card
Musical talent before transition to finance
Family likely submitted this page for birthday book

photos.description: Black and white 1964 youth band performance photo

position_map.left_to_right: Bobby (guitar), Howie (bass), Dick Epstein (standing), Jeff (accordion seated), Peter (standing), David (standing right)

photos.setting: Indoor performance venue or rehearsal space

logos: Piano and accordion illustration on business card

forensic_notes: Business card phone partially visible as (212) 15 3-2345
Dick Epstein likely brother Mark Epstein
Professional business cards at age 11 unusual
Transition from music to finance needs investigation
Handwriting on photo appears to be from 2003 compilation
investigative_leads: Identify if Dick Epstein is Mark Epstein
Trace ALL OCCASIONS business registration in NYC
Locate surviving band members for interviews
Determine who submitted this page to birthday book
